mapper.select: SELECT q.stock_no stock_no, q.product_no product_no, q.product_name product_name, IFNULL(c.product_option_no,'없음') product_option_no, IFNULL(c.product_option_name,'없음') product_option_name, q.stock_quantity stock_quantity, d.product_status product_status FROM ( SELECT a.product_no, a.stock_quantity, a.stock_no, b.product_name, a.product_option_no FROM stock a LEFT JOIN product b ON a.product_no = b.product_no ) q left JOIN product_option c ON q.product_option_no = c.product_option_no left JOIN product_post d ON q.product_no = d.product_no WHERE q.product_name like CONCAT('%', #{ searchInfo }, '%') ORDER BY stock_no
SELECT product_option_no FROM product a JOIN product_option b ON a.product_no = b.product_no WHERE product_option_name = #{ option }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock (stock_quantity, product_no, product_option_no) VALUES ( #{amount} , #{ number }, #{ optionNo })
INSERT INTO stock (stock_quantity, product_no) VALUES ( #{amount} , #{ num } )
mapper.select: SELECT in_no, product_name, product_option_name, in_quantity, DATE_FORMAT(in_date, '%Y-%m-%d') in_date FROM ( SELECT a.in_no, a.in_quantity, a.in_date, d.product_name, q.product_option_name FROM in_warehouse a LEFT JOIN stock b ON a.stock_no = b.stock_no JOIN product d ON b.product_no = d.product_no JOIN product_option q ON b.product_option_no = q.product_option_no)t
